title: dyninst: failed installation on ubuntu-14.04-trusty
body:
recent, I was installing dyninst on my ubuntu-14.04-trusty(x86-64), when I install it with the cmd `spack install dyninst`, but unluckily I got this error 
```
/home/luwentao/software/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/dyninst/package.py:93, in install:
     66       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     67           if spec.satisfies('@:8.1'):
     68               configure("--prefix=" + prefix)
     69               make()
     70               make("install")
     71               return
     72   
     73           libelf = spec['libelf'].prefix
     74           libdwarf = spec['libdwarf'].prefix
     75   
     76           with working_dir('spack-build', create=True):
     77               args = ['..',
     78                       '-DBoost_INCLUDE_DIR=%s'    % spec['boost'].prefix.include,
     79                       '-DBoost_LIBRARY_DIR=%s'    % spec['boost'].prefix.lib,
     80                       '-DBoost_NO_SYSTEM_PATHS=TRUE',
     81                       '-DLIBELF_INCLUDE_DIR=%s'   % join_path(
     82                           libelf.include, 'libelf'),
     83                       '-DLIBELF_LIBRARIES=%s'     % join_path(
     84                           libelf.lib, 'libelf.so'),
     85                       '-DLIBDWARF_INCLUDE_DIR=%s' % libdwarf.include,
     86                       '-DLIBDWARF_LIBRARIES=%s'   % join_path(
     87                           libdwarf.lib, 'libdwarf.so')]
     88               if spec.satisfies('arch=linux-redhat7-ppc64le'):
     89                   args.append('-Darch_ppc64_little_endian=1')
     90               args += std_cmake_args
     91               cmake(*args)
     92               make()
  >> 93               make("install")
```
the last 20 lines of the `spack-build.out` is 
```
make[4]: Entering Directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build/testsuite'
make[3]: Entering Directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build'
cd /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build && /home/luwentao/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/cmake-3.7.2-7m66awhkvsvaeqnunkb7uhxqto4bjztx/bin/cmake -E touch /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-stamp/LibIberty-build
[ 10%] Performing install step for 'LibIberty'
cd /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build && install /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build/libiberty.a /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/libiberty
cd /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-build && /home/luwentao/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/cmake-3.7.2-7m66awhkvsvaeqnunkb7uhxqto4bjztx/bin/cmake -E touch /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-stamp/LibIberty-install
[ 10%] Completed 'LibIberty'
/home/luwentao/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/cmake-3.7.2-7m66awhkvsvaeqnunkb7uhxqto4bjztx/bin/cmake -E make_directory /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/CMakeFiles
/home/luwentao/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/cmake-3.7.2-7m66awhkvsvaeqnunkb7uhxqto4bjztx/bin/cmake -E touch /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/CMakeFiles/LibIberty-complete
/home/luwentao/software/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-4.8/cmake-3.7.2-7m66awhkvsvaeqnunkb7uhxqto4bjztx/bin/cmake -E touch /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build/binutils/src/LibIberty-stamp/LibIberty-done
make[2]: Entering Directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build'
[ 10%] Built target LibIberty
/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/common/src/arch-x86.C: In static member function ‘static void NS_x86::ia32_instruction::initFlagTable(std::tr1::unordered_map<entryID, NS_x86::flagInfo>&)’:
/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/common/src/arch-x86.C:1920:6: note: variable tracking size limit exceeded with -fvar-tracking-assignments, retrying without
 void ia32_instruction::initFlagTable(dyn_hash_map<entryID, flagInfo>& flagTable)
      ^
make[2]: Entering Directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build'
make[1]: *** [common/CMakeFiles/common.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: Entering Directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-ylcQuu/dyninst/spack-build'
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
when I run `spack find` I can get this 
```
-- linux-ubuntu14-x86_64 / gcc@4.8 ------------------------------
boost@1.63.0
bzip2@1.0.6
cmake@3.7.2
libdwarf@20160507
libelf@0.8.13
ncurses@6.0
openssl@1.1.0d
perl@5.24.1
zlib@1.2.10
```
so , I can confirm that all the dependencies were installed successfully, so I do not know why the error occurred. should I install it on other unix like RH or 32bit environment?
any response welcomed, ^__^ , thanks.
